subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lorena Ochoa shot her second straight seven-under 66 to take a one-stroke lead in the Corona Championship in Morelia, Mexico. Inbee Park was second after a nine-under 64 that tied the course record set by Ochoa in 2006. Song-Hee Kim, who was tied for the lead with Ochoa after the first round, was three strokes back after a 69. If the 26-year-old Ochoa wins Sunday, she will earn the last of the 27 points needed to qualify for the L.P.G.A.’s Hall of Fame, making her the youngest player to qualify.
